about_the_game: The Chronicles of Lurra is a free to play RPG set in the fictional world of Lurra. You follow Trent, the main character as he is dragged from his home through time and space to the world of Lurra. His long time friend Adrian drags him away and ropes him into his schemes of robbing a bank, a grand heist, with his companions Maya and Tyrus the Magnificent. With his only way home in the hands of his friend, Trent must go along with the heist in order to return home.

With his only way home in the hands of his friend, Trent must go along with the heist in order to return home.
name: Chronicles of Lurra

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Everything made since 2004 should work
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated works
